settings.title: Settings

groups.manage: Group related workspaces and adjust order within groups.
groups.create: Create group labels for related repositories.

workspaces.manage: Assign workspaces to groups and adjust order.

environment.configure: Configure environment scripts for each workspace that run after creating a worktree.
environment.script_description: Runs once in a dedicated terminal after each new worktree creation.
environment.clipboard_unavailable: Current environment cannot access clipboard, please copy the script manually.

display_sound.adjust: Adjust visual effects and notification sounds.
display_sound.rendering: Adjust window background and effects rendering.
display_sound.ui_font_description: Applied to all interface text. Leave blank to use system default font.
display_sound.code_font_description: Adjust code and diff text size.
display_sound.notification_sound_description: Play notification sound when long-running agents finish while window is not in foreground.

composer.control: Control assistant and formatting behavior in the message editor.
composer.presets_description: Choose a starting point and fine-tune switches below.
composer.presets_sync: Presets automatically update the switches below; you can customize after selecting.
composer.expand_on_space_description: Inserts code block fence when typing ``` followed by space.
composer.expand_on_enter_description: When enabled, pressing enter on a ``` line expands it.
composer.wrap_selection_description: Wrap selected text when creating a fence.
composer.copy_without_fences_description: When enabled, copies as plain text. Hold {optionKeyLabel} to include ``` fences.
composer.auto_wrap_multiline_description: Wrap multi-line pasted content in code block fences.
composer.auto_wrap_single_line_description: Automatically wrap long single-line code when pasting.
composer.continue_list_description: Continue numbered/bulleted list when line has content.

dictation.enable: Enable microphone dictation and local transcription.
dictation.first_use: Downloads selected Whisper model on first use.
dictation.language_preference_description: Auto-detection remains on; this setting biases the decoder toward your preference.
dictation.hold_to_dictate_description: Hold this key to start dictating, release to stop and process.

features.git_diff: Manage how Git diffs are loaded in the Git sidebar.

features.ignore_whitespace_description: Hides whitespace-only changes in local and commit diffs.
features.codex_config: Configure the Codex CLI used by CodexMonitor and verify installation.
features.default_codex_path_description: Leave blank to use system PATH.
features.default_codex_args_description: Extra arguments appended before app-server. Values with spaces should use quotes.
features.review_mode_description: Choose /review to run in current thread or separate review thread.
features.remote_description: Remote mode connects to a daemon on another machine (e.g., WSL2/Linux) to run the backend.

features.communication_style_description: Select Codex's communication style (writes to top-level `personality` in config.toml).
features.guided_mode_description: Messages send immediately. Use Tab to queue while running.
features.background_terminal_description: Run time-consuming terminal commands in the background.
features.experimental_features_description: Preview features that may change or be removed.
